event.title: Round Table on Cybersecurity, Human Rights and Digital Sovereignty (online)

body.p: On 23 June, 14:15 CEST, Lucas Lasota, FSFE Deputy Legal Coordinator and Research Associate at Humboldt University of Berlin will discuss cybersecurity, human rights and digital sovereignty together with Katerina Yordanova and Elisabetta Biasin from KU Leuven Centre for IT & IP Law. Entrance is free but access is limited. The panel will be held in English. For enrollment, please send an email to sekretariat.zech(at)rewi.hu-berlin.de
